CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 10, 1951, pg. 1, reads: "Bedford Addition Demolition Starts - On Wednesday morning officials of the Pittsburgh Housing Authority's board of directors and official representatives of the U. S. put their hands to the rope shown tied around a pillar of a porch on Kirkpatrick Street and officially began the demolition for the new addition to Bedford Dwellings. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of Pittsburgh Housing Authority and politicians pulling rope attached to pillar of porch of dilapidated house, with workers on porch, porch roof, and roof, Kirkpatrick Street, Hill District
